product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies Find-Me Light Sticks - Package of 2 - Special Buy
long_description: Giving off soft, glowing light, the Find-Me Light Sticks from Ultimate Survival Technologies can be used as signaling devices or to provide light around your campsite. Package contains 1 green and 1 white lightstick; each lightstick provides approximately 12 hours of light. Weatherproof construction stands up to harsh conditions; included lanyard allows easy attachment to tents and other fixtures. Find-Me Lightsticks can be used for emergency, utility, or entertainment purposes; sticks are non-toxic and inner contents are non-flammable. Special buy.
short_description: Giving off soft, glowing light, the Find-Me Light Sticks from Ultimate Survival Technologies can be used as signaling devices or to provide light around your campsite.
